pkgmetadata.longdescription: SQL Server R Database Interface (DBI) and dplyr SQL Backend // Utilises The jTDS Project's JDBC 3.0 SQL Server driver to extend the RJDBC classes and DBI methods. It defines a SQLServerDriver, SQLServerConnection SQLServerRsult S4 classes as extensions of the RJDBC equivalent classes with most DBI methods being thin extensions of the methods defined by RJDBC classes. However, the dbConnect interface is more convenient, and the data reading and writing capabilities found in RJDBC's fetch and dbWriteTable methods have been refined. The package also implements a SQL backend to the dplyr package.
